{{infobox character | people=[[Noldor|Noldo]] | name=Findis | image=Sempern0x - Findis.jpg | caption="Findis" by [[:Category:Images by Sempern0x|Sempern0x]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Valinor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Quenya]] | birth=between {{YT|1185}} and {{YT|1190}} | birthlocation=[[Tirion]] | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Finwë]] | parentage=[[Finwë]] and [[Indis]] | siblings=[[Fëanor]] (half-brother), [[Fingolfin]], [[Írimë]], and [[Finarfin]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Findis''' was a [[Noldo]]rin [[Elves|Elf]]. She was the first child and daughter of [[Finwë]], the [[King of the Noldor]], and [[Indis]], his second wife. She did not follow the [[Exile of the Noldor|Noldor into exile]], instead abiding amongst the [[Vanyar]] with her mother.{{PM|Finwe}}, p. 343 It is stated that they were in grief until [[Manwë]] deemed to restore Finwë to life, but that he may not have, as little is actually known of what occurred in [[Aman]] following the departure of the Noldor.{{PM|XINotes}}, note 27 ==Etymology== Her name was a combination of her parents' names. :''See [[Finwë#Etymology|Finwë: Etymology]] and [[Indis#Etymology|Indis: Etymology]].'' ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| MIR |~|y|~| FIN |~|y|~| IND | | | | | | | | | |FIN=[[Finwë]]
